sources.title: Where is Kyra? (MOVING FILM with KIEFER SUTHERLAND, full film in German, feature films for free)

metadata.Plot: Thirteen-year-old Kyra has grown up in an isolated community without questioning the fact that her father has three wives and she has twenty brothers and sisters. But when the "Prophet" decrees that she must marry her sixty-year-old uncle, Kyra must make a desperate choice in the face of violence and her own fears of losing her family forever.
metadata.Writer: Maclain Nelson, Clare Niederpruem, Carol Lynch Williams (novel)
